name: Phasmophobia: Hall of Specters
description:
Chapter 1:
Fast-paced First-Person survival horror maze inspired by a retro classic, for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android with Google Cardboard VR Support!

Hall of Specters virtually puts you in the shoes of your own defenseless persona, you must fight your fears and endure the terror along the way. Can you find your way out of the maze? Your only clues are to find the Letters of the Lost that were mysteriously left by those who didn't survive. You can use your flashlight to defend yourself from whatever haunts the maze, but BE CAREFUL! The batteries don't last very long!


The Features:
  • Immersive gameplay with gruesome visuals
  • Fearsome sounds and action-paced music
  • Controller Support
  • Google Cardboard VR Support


The Series:

Phasmophobia is a horror game series inspired by classic game mechanics from the 70s and 80s. At the same time, noticeably inspired by games from the 90s to now. We think about the games we loved back then and the ones we love now and then we discover what makes the two so great. Then ask how we can make it scare the sh&% out of people, so we can finally create one solid experience for true fans of horror and gamers of many different generations.
